dt-option.name: SearchBuilder.preDefined

type.description: The details object for the top level group.
When false no predefined search is applied.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined` option is false meaning that as standard there will be no preDefined search applied.
dt-option.description:
This is useful as it allows for complex preDefined searches to be applied to a DataTable.
This object contains 3 properties.
* `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria` This holds the criteria that must be applied to the top group. This property is an array of objects, which can either by criteria objects or group objects. * `-init searchBuilder.logic` This is the logic that is to be applied to the group. * `-init searchBuilder.type` This indicates that this object is a group of criteria.
